title: Video: BROODS – Bridges
content:
From the same producer (Joel Little) as Lorde’s number one single Royals, comes NZ’s Broods with Bridges, one of the most captivating debut tracks of the year.

Having exploded on Soundcloud, racking up over 100k+ plays in a matter of weeks, the duo were quick to get working on a video for the track. Echoing the spacious, otherworldly feel to the song itself, it’s a fitting introduction to BROODS, and far from the last we’ll be hearing from them.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
